# Advanced Storm Beacon

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/advanced-storm-beacon
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:21:07.445475

---

When placed on your island, the Advanced Storm Beacon device provides a way to configure individual [storm phases](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#stormphase) when used in conjunction with the [Advanced Storm Controller](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#advancedstormcontroller) device.
